<< getnelsonmode Engine System Requirements >>

isquietmode

Return true if Nelson started with --quiet option.

Syntax

res = isquietmode()

Output argument

res

a logical true or false

Description

isquietmode returns a logical 1 if Nelson started with --quiet option and a logical 0 otherwise.

Example

disp(isquietmode());

See also

executable.

History

Version Description
1.0.0 initial version

Author

Allan CORNET
